import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import bg1 from '../../assets/images/background/bg-1.png' import bg2 from '../../assets/images/background/bg-2.png' import offerimg1 from '../../assets/images/resource/offer-image-1.jpg' import offerimg2 from '../../assets/images/resource/offer-image-2.jpg' import offerimg3 from '../../assets/images/resource/offer-image-3.jpg' function Offer() { const offers = [ { image: offerimg1, title: 'Dinner', link: '#', }, { image: offerimg2, title: 'Appetizers', link: '#', }, { image: offerimg3, title: 'Drinks', link: '#', }, ] return ( <>
